colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES SHING GI LHA MO LA MCHOD TSUL TSE THAR GSOL MCHOD BSANGS MCHOD 'PHRIN BCOL GA-YANG DGUGS DANG BCAS PA 'DOD 'JO DPAG BSAM LJONG SHING ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD LDAN SBYIN BDAG RNAMS KYIS DGOS KYI DBANG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^BHI KshA'I GZUGS PA BRNYAN WA GINDRA MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DI YANG BSTAN PA DANG BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG RNAMS LA BDE SKYED 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
